name: sgs.tachogeek.jsapp
description: TachoGeek javascript application for tweaking the online store

scripts.build:dev:app: NODE_ENV=development set BROWSERSLIST_ENV=development && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development --env target=app
scripts.build:dev:loader: NODE_ENV=development set BROWSERSLIST_ENV=development && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development --env target=loader
scripts.build:prod:app: NODE_ENV=production set BROWSERSLIST_ENV=production && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production --node-env=production --env target=app
scripts.build:prod:loader: NODE_ENV=production set BROWSERSLIST_ENV=production && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production --node-env=production --env target=loader
